Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addSubscribeHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when a client succesfully subscribes to a query.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addUnsubscribeHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when a query has been unsubscribed.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addErrorHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an error occurs.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addEventHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an event occurs.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addEnterHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an object enters a query.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addLeaveHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an object leaves a query.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addCreateHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an object that matches the query is created.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addUpdateHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an object that matches the query is updated.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.name: addDeleteHandler(_:)
Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html#/s:.abstract: Register a callback for when an object that matches the query is deleted.

Structs/ObjCCompat/Event.html.name: Event

Structs/ObjCCompat/Subscription.html.abstract: A default implementation of the SubscriptionHandling protocol, using blocks for callbacks.

Structs/ObjCCompat.html.name: ObjCCompat
Structs/ObjCCompat.html.abstract: This struct wraps up all of our Objective-C compatibility layer. You should never need to touch this if you’re using Swift.

Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.name: didRecieveEvent(_:event:client:)
Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.abstract: Tells the handler that an event has been received from the live query server.

Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.name: didRecieveError(_:error:client:)
Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.abstract: Tells the handler that an error has been received from the live query server.

Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.name: didSubscribe(_:client:)
Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.abstract: Tells the handler that a query has been successfully registered with the server.

Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.name: didUnsubscribe(_:client:)
Protocols/ObjCCompat_SubscriptionHandlin.abstract: Tells the handler that a query has been successfully deregistered from the server.

Protocols/SubscriptionHandling.html#/s:1.abstract: Tells the handler that a query has been successfully registered with the server.
